text: The men's pole vault event at the 1970 Summer Universiade was held at the Stadio Comunale in Turin on 3 September 1970. ==Records== {| class="wikitable" width=65% |- !colspan="5"|Standing records prior to the 1970 Summer Universiade |- |World record | |5.45 |East Berlin, East Germany |17 June 1970 |- |Universiade record | |5.00 |Tokyo, Japan |1967 |} ==Results== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !
